T02D3121:219b-0: @219b ` // stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs /
T02D3121:219b-2: * // de bzhin thams cad sngar gyi cho gas stong pa nyid kyi rjes la /
T02D3121:219b-3: stong chan mo rab tu 'joms ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug pa ste /
T02D3121:219b-4: g-yas kyi phyag gsum na go rims bzhin du ral gri dang /
T02D3121:219b-6: g-yon gyi phyag gsum na gzhu dang /
T02D3121:219b-8: sna tshogs pa'i cha byad can /
T02D3121:219b-10: rgyan dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02D3121:219b-11: gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa /
T02D3121:219b-12: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
T02D3121:219b-13: rnam bar snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can /
T02D3121:219b-14: sa bon brum yig las byung ba'o //
T02D3121:219b-15: padma dang zla ba'i 'od can mo //
